column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Top notch food! This place stands out from all the other pizza places in Chiago
column2: it's one of my favorites! I love the deep dish
column3: baked pizza a lot. Whenever I'm semi-close to the area
column4: it's an always go to on my list. The wait can be a bit excessive at times
column5: but again this is quality stuff so I think the wait is justified in my opinion. The people who work here are always smiling
column6: cheerful. Good environment and great food!
